comments:
Description: Error message appears when preview an image with relative path.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add an image.
2. In image builder, set url as "\images\R.jpg".
3. Click on "preview" tab.
4. The image is displayed but error message appears.
There are errors on the report page: 
-There are error(s) in Image : 151 
Error0 : Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: There are errors evaluating script "\images\R.jpg". at
